mapper.select: select * from users where roleId=0 and mobileNum = #{id} or wcId = #{id}

select u.likes as likes, u.name as userName, k.name as kidName, e.name as eventName, e.stage as stage, et.name as eventTypeName, s.name as serieName, e.eventTime as eventTime, a.rank as rank, a.score as score, cr.credit as credit, cr.goldenMedal as goldenMedal, cr.silverMedal as silverMedal, cr.bronzeMedal as bronzeMedal from creditRecords cr, users u, kids k, events e, eventTypes et, series s, attendees a where e.eventTypeId=et.id and s.id = e.seriesId and a.eventId=cr.eventId and a.kidId=k.id and k.userId=cr.userId and e.id=cr.eventId and cr.userId=u.id and cr.userId = #{id} and cr.creditRuleType='EVENT' and cr.status=0

select e.id as eventId, e.eventTime as eventTime, et.id as eventTypeId, cr.`bronzeMedal` as bronzeMedal, cr.`attendeeId` as attendeeId, cr.`rank` as rank, cr.score as score, cr.`silverMedal` as silverMedal,cr.credit as credit, cr.`goldenMedal` as goldenMedal, et.name as eventTypeName,k.id as kidId, k.name as kidName, u.likes as likes, u.name as userName, e.stage as stage, k.userId as userId, k.avatarUrl as avatarUrl, k.schoolType as schoolType, k.schoolName as schoolName, r.id as roundId, r.levelName as roundLevelName, r.level as roundLevel, e.siteId as siteId from events e, creditRecords cr, eventTypes et, users u, kids k , sites s, attendees a left join rounds r on a.roundId = r.id where k.id=a.kidId and et.id=e.eventTypeId and cr.attendeeId=a.id and s.id=et.siteId and e.id = cr.eventId and k.userId=u.id and et.id = #{id} and cr.status=0 order by eventTime limit #{start}, #{limit}

insert users (id, name, password, mobileNum, location, roleId,status,siteId, idp, createdTime, lastModifiedTime) values (#{id},#{name},#{password},#{mobileNum},#{location},#{roleId},#{status},#{siteId},#{idp},now(),now())
update users set name=#{name}, mobileNum=#{mobileNum}, location=#{location}, roleId=#{roleId}, siteId=#{siteId}, status=#{status}, credit=#{credit} where id = #{id};
select count(1) as totalAttend, min(a.score) as fatestScore, u.credit as credit from attendees a, events e, users u where a.userId = u.id and a.eventId=e.id and u.id = #{id} and a.score >0
mapper.update: update users set likes = #{likes} where id = #{id}
